description: PersistentVolumeClaimStatus is the current status of a persistent volume claim.

phase.description: Phase represents the current phase of PersistentVolumeClaim.

accessModes.description: AccessModes contains the actual access modes the volume backing the PVC has. More info: https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/storage/persistent-volumes#access-modes-1

capacity.description: Represents the actual resources of the underlying volume.
